issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
App runs on iOS, but crashes at start on Android (Version 4.0.3).

*Stack trace*
{code}
-----------
D/dalvikvm(  765): GREF has increased to 201
W/ActivityManager(   76): Activity idle timeout for ActivityRecord{4137f878 com.factisresearch.gutgepflegt/.GutgepflegtActivity}
D/AndroidRuntime(  765): Shutting down VM
W/dalvikvm(  765): threadid=1: thread exiting with uncaught exception (group=0x409c01f8)
E/TiApplication(  765): (main) [980,980] Sending event: exception on thread: main msg:java.lang.NullPointerException; Titanium 3.0.0,2012/12/12 18:49,a5894b3
E/TiApplication(  765): java.lang.NullPointerException
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at org.appcelerator.titanium.view.TiUIView.handleBackgroundImage(TiUIView.java:932)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at org.appcelerator.titanium.view.TiUIView.processProperties(TiUIView.java:671)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at ti.modules.titanium.ui.TiUIActivityWindow.processProperties(TiUIActivityWindow.java:442)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at org.appcelerator.kroll.KrollProxy.handleMessage(KrollProxy.java:893)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at org.appcelerator.titanium.proxy.TiViewProxy.handleMessage(TiViewProxy.java:310)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at org.appcelerator.titanium.proxy.TiWindowProxy.handleMessage(TiWindowProxy.java:107)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:95)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:137)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:4424)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invokeNative(Native Method)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:511)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(ZygoteInit.java:784)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:551)
E/TiApplication(  765): 	at dalvik.system.NativeStart.main(Native Method)
E/AndroidRuntime(  765): FATAL EXCEPTION: main
{code}

comments.body:
Hi Fabian,

Please can you provide a simple reproducible test case for this?

Thanks!

I've set this to resolved so that the issue can now be edited to provide more info. We appreciate your time in helping to improve our platform.

Thanks,
Daniel
